front.title: Using GOST 28147-89, GOST R 34.10-2001, and GOST R 34.11-94 Algorithms for XML Security

abstract.t: This document specifies how to use Russian national cryptographicstandards GOST 28147-89, GOST R 34.10-2001 and GOST R 34.11-94 withXML Signatures, XML Encryption, WS-SecureConversation, WS-SecurityPolicy and WS-Trust. A number of Uniform ResourceIdentifiers (URIs) and XML elements are defined.
